document.full_text: libya's rebels said they hoped to restart oil production and gained pledges of more than $500 million of aid on thursday as western powers press them to plan for the day after muammar gaddafi leaves power.
document.title: libya rebels eye oil restart, win aid pledges
lines_and_colors: libya's rebels said they hoped to restart oil production and gained pledges of more than $500 million of aid on thursday as western powers press them to plan for the day after muammar gaddafi leaves power.
